trans-unit.target: TEXT_KINGME104_04935_SEQ_00<tab>Having recomposed herself, Sphene is ready to continue the tour.
TEXT_KINGME104_04935_TODO_00<tab>Speak with Sphene.
TEXT_KINGME104_04935_TODO_01<tab>Speak with Sphene again.
TEXT_KINGME104_04935_TODO_02<tab>Speak with Wuk Lamat.
TEXT_KINGME104_04935_TODO_03<tab>Speak with Wuk Lamat again.
TEXT_KINGME104_04935_WUKLAMAT_000_001<tab>To think that they had such a problem...
TEXT_KINGME104_04935_SPHENE_000_010<tab>Well, let's continue the tour, shall we?
TEXT_KINGME104_04935_WUKLAMAT_000_011<tab>Look, you obviously have duties to attend to─citizens to look after. We can stop here if you like.
TEXT_KINGME104_04935_SPHENE_000_012<tab>No, no. I do this because I want to, so please do not worry.

TEXT_KINGME104_04935_SPHENE_000_013<tab>Next, I'll show you one of the district's most vital facilities, a place called Resolution. To reach it, we'll need to go by way of leynode nine, where the aetheryte is situated.
TEXT_KINGME104_04935_WUKLAMAT_000_015<tab><gulp> D-Don't tell me we need to use that now?
TEXT_KINGME104_04935_SPHENE_000_020<tab>The conveyor ahead will transport you to the government sector, where Resolution is located.
TEXT_KINGME104_04935_SPHENE_000_021<tab>The markings on a conveyor indicate its direction, and there is a pair just like it on the other side.
TEXT_KINGME104_04935_WUKLAMAT_000_022<tab>I-Is it safe?
TEXT_KINGME104_04935_SPHENE_000_023<tab>Extremely. There's no need to be afraid.
TEXT_KINGME104_04935_WUKLAMAT_000_024<tab>Wh-Who said I was afraid? Come on, <var 2C ((<var 29 EB02 /var>)) (( )) 02 /var>!
TEXT_KINGME104_04935_WUKLAMAT_000_025<tab>N-Nothing to it, eh? A child's amusement ride!
TEXT_KINGME104_04935_SPHENE_000_030<tab>And here we are─Resolution, the operational heart of Solution Nine.
TEXT_KINGME104_04935_SPHENE_000_031<tab>From Resolution we oversee the running of the district and provide essential services to citizens, such as welfare support and job introductions.
TEXT_KINGME104_04935_SPHENE_000_032<tab>It's quicker to show than tell, so let's proceed inside.
TEXT_KINGME104_04935_WUKLAMAT_000_035<tab>What was Sphene wanting to tell us, I wonder...
TEXT_KINGME104_04935_WUKLAMAT_000_036<tab>Well, it can wait for another time. We've been exploring for a while now and should probably go to Cahciua's meeting point.
TEXT_KINGME104_04935_WUKLAMAT_000_037<tab>That'll be back the way we came...I think?
TEXT_KINGME104_04935_WUKLAMAT_000_040<tab>Sphene genuinely cares for her people. I can respect her for that.
TEXT_KINGME104_04935_WUKLAMAT_000_041<tab>And thanks to her tour, I've come to better understand the lives of Alexandrians.
TEXT_KINGME104_04935_WUKLAMAT_000_042<tab>They don't feel so strange and distant anymore.
